replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 GiNYAi 于 2019-5-5 22:34 编辑 

IC2 fixed the crash on their end in build 240. However, I suppose there is still an empty stack floating around, it just isn't causing crashes.

I've found that shift-clicking items in the crafting bench will trigger the crash often (but not always).

Inventory tweaks (the mod) triggers it as well

https://github.com/SpongePowered/SpongeForge/issues/1607

先尝试更新ic2吧

出错的物品似乎是IC2  工具箱
